video_prompt: A futuristic figure's lower body fluidly transitions into dark, tendril-like forms that pool and morph around its legs and waist. Particles of dark matter subtly emerge from background and splatter onto the figure. The figure's halo-like glow around its head and shoulders flickers.
image_prompt: futuristic, low-angle, full-body portrait of a sleek, metallic female cyborg or deity with an ethereal glow/halo around her head. Her upper body is luminous silver, transitioning to glossy, dark, liquid-like tendrils pooling around her feet and legs. Her face is minimalist and smooth, with an antler-like silver crown. The background features a stormy sky over a dark, volcanic landscape with debris, against a vibrant, matte red foreground resembling spilled blood, splattered with dark matter.
refined_video_prompt: From the figure's lower body, dark tendrils fluidly emerge, pooling and morphing around its legs and waist. Dark matter particles continuously appear from the background, splattering onto the figure. A halo-like glow around its head and shoulders constantly flickers and pulses.
